text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: Q) In the figure, AOB is a straight line. What is
the average of the four numbers a, b, c, d ?

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 25px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer; fill-opacity: 1;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: In the figure, AOB is a straight line, and a straight angle measures 180°. Hence, the sum of the angles a, b,
c, and d is 180, and the average of the four is their sum divided by 4: 180/4 = 45

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer; fill-opacity: 1;
